translation.en: -♪ I'm wanted… ♪ -[man] Hey, Ross. You got any more of these black tarps?
translation.ja: 黒いタープは もうない？

translation.en: Hey, what do you think you're doin'? I wanted those.
translation.ja: やめろ　必要なんだ
身代金は払っていません

translation.en: We did not, repeat, did not trade weapons or anything else for hostages,
translation.ja: 身代金は払っていません さらに人質解放のために 武器の提供も行っていません
武器の提供も行っていません

translation.en: President Reagan addressing the heightened tensions with Iran in the wake of rumors
translation.ja: レーガン大統領は1953年の イランのクーデターへの

translation.en: -about the CIA's involvement… -[echoing] Lou. …in the country's 1953 coup.
translation.ja: ＣＩＡの関与疑惑について 説明しました

translation.en: In other news, pages from the Rogers Commission's report
translation.ja: 次はチャレンジャー号事故の

translation.en: on the Space Shuttle Challenger disaster, with NASA under fire…
translation.ja: ロジャース委員会報告です

translation.en: You, uh, ready for the big storm?
And, uh, how much will you be taking out today?
Without Iran's cooperation, we cannot bring an end to the Persian Gulf War.
translation.ja: イランの協力なしに ペルシャ湾での戦争は 終わりません
ペルシャ湾での戦争は 終わりません ずいぶん大金ね

translation.en: I know. I'm the one who put it in there.
translation.ja: そうよ　私が貯めてた

translation.en: If you'd like to place a call, please deposit 25 cents before dialing.
translation.ja: 25セント入れて 電話をかけてください

translation.en: If you need help, please hang up and try your call again.
translation.ja: 問題があれば かけ直してください

translation.en: Jax is in a good mood.
translation.ja: ジャックスが 興奮してるようだが

translation.en: Can't help but wonder if the spark of the hunt hasn't got him all worked up.
translation.ja: ジャックスが 興奮してるようだが 狩りが原因？

translation.en: Deer must have just bolted out of nowhere.
Well, I'm glad you and Jax came out of it okay.
translation.ja: 無事で よかったよ

translation.en: You know, you ought to get yourself one of these copper bracelets.
-Pretty. -My niece got it for me on the mainland.
translation.ja: いいね 姪(めい)が買ってきた

translation.en: One of those stores, you know, with the dream catchers and crystals and whatnot.
translation.ja: ドリームキャッチャーや 水晶の店だ

translation.en: -[starts engine] -I laughed at her. But I swear to God, I barely feel the arthritis anymore.
translation.ja: 最初は疑ってたが 今では関節炎を感じない

translation.en: Careful you don't get struck by lightning wearin' that thing.
-[man] Got your ticket? -[woman] Of course! I got my ticket.
[man] This is a severe weather watch.
The biggest storm the Pacific Northwest has seen in years
translation.ja: 今夜 太平洋岸北西部に

translation.en: is expected to make landfall early this evening.
Residents are encouraged to stay in their homes
and be prepared for downed power lines and flooding in low-lying areas.
translation.ja: 断線や低地の浸水に 備えてください

translation.en: Ferry service to the San Juan Islands has also been suspended until further notice
translation.ja: サンファン諸島への フェリーは 暴風雨が進路上にあるため 運行停止です

translation.en: as the area is directly in the storm's path.
translation.ja: 暴風雨が進路上にあるため 運行停止です

translation.en: [woman] Where could she be? I don't know.

translation.ja: 木の下にはいないし 木の下にはいないし 〝トゥルーバリュー〞 〝トゥルーバリュー〞
〝トゥルーバリュー〞 ここじゃない ここじゃない

translation.en: Oh, she's so good at hiding.
-I got you! -[squeals] -I got you! I got you! -[laughing]
translation.ja: 見つけた　ここにいたのね

translation.en: -[giggling] -You didn't say the code! Little Rabbit.
Oh! Little Rabbit, Little Rabbit! -Little Rabbit! -[both laughing]
I said no, Vee. Come on.
Mom, do you think Daddy's gonna find the treasure soon?
translation.ja: パパは もう宝を見つけた？

translation.en: I don't know, Vee. I bet he's real close.
And then is Daddy gonna come home?
You know, the storm looks like it's a while away.
translation.ja: 嵐は まだ来なそうね

translation.en: We could probably fit in another game.
I bet you can't make it past three minutes before I find you, though.
-Oh, I can. -Oh, I don't think you can. Mm-mm.
All right. Let me see. Ready? Set…
translation.ja: じゃあ 準備はいい？
ゲームはじめ ゲームはじめ
ルー 明日 家賃を

translation.en: I know. Listen, now, I had to lay in supplies for the storm.
translation.ja: 嵐に備える必要が あったから…

translation.en: -[sighs] All right. -Tomorrow. Inside. On the table.
translation.ja: そう 明日 机の上に置いて

translation.en: It'll get wet in the mailbox.
What the hell is wrong with you?
Why you gotta drive so goddamn fast? You know there's a child nearby.
translation.ja: 子どもがいるのに スピードを

translation.en: World's not a playground. Teach your kid to look out for herself.
translation.ja: ここは遊び場じゃない 注意させて

translation.en: [man] Heading into town to get some supplies. -Can I get you anything? -[sighs]
-You doin' all right? -[sighing] Yeah, I'm just tired.
translation.ja: 平気？ 疲れてるだけ

translation.en: -[Chris] All right. -[sighs] [Chris] Is Lou still bein' a pain in your ass?
translation.ja: ルーと また何かあった？

translation.en: -[sighs] I told you about that? -[chuckling] Yeah.
translation.ja: 話したっけ？ そうだよ　覚えてない？

translation.en: Yeah, you don't… you don't remember?
translation.ja: そうだよ　覚えてない？

translation.en: -Look, we were both pretty drunk, so… -Yeah.

translation.ja: ええ　覚えてるのは…

translation.en: I do remember you singing "Like A Virgin" at the top of your lungs.
translation.ja: あなたの「ライク･ア･ ヴァージン」

translation.en: Oh, please swear you'll never tell.
[Vee] Mom! I can't find Mr. Hippo!
translation.ja: ママ カバさんがない

translation.en: -[Chris sighs] -[Vee] Mom, help me find him.
Have you had a chance to talk to Vee yet?
-Any way I could get a ride? -Yeah, of course.
translation.ja: 乗っても？ もちろん

translation.en: [man] Oh, damn rental car broke down on me. You're a lifesaver. [laughs]
translation.ja: レンタカーが故障した 助かったよ

translation.en: Oh, jeez, I'm-- I'm gettin' your seat all soaked.
translation.ja: すまない　シートが濡れる

translation.en: Don't worry about it, man. I'm just glad I passed you when I did.
translation.ja: 通りかかってよかった

translation.en: -[man] Oh. -[Chris] The storm's gonna be gnarly.
Yeah, I bought it for a friend of mine.
Her ex died three months ago, and she's just-- she's havin' a hard time facin' it.
translation.ja: 彼女の元夫が ３か月前に死んだ

translation.en: I see. And you wanna help her face it, right? Hm? 'Cause you wanna be more than just friends?
translation.ja: 力になりたいのか 友達以上になるため

translation.en: Oh, look, I just-- She has a kid. She wants to take it slow.
translation.ja: 彼女には子どももいる 急がない
このバンド 大好きだ

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. He's the best. -♪ …things that you say that you'll do ♪
You know when you were asking about Daddy earlier?

translation.ja: あなたをとても愛してる

translation.en: And he thinks about you all the time.
translation.ja: 常に あなたを思ってる
友情のブレス 私も作りたいわ

translation.en: I wanna make a friendship bracelet.
You're making a bracelet for Lou? Why?

translation.ja: ママは違う いいえ

translation.en: Okay. I actually don't like Lou.
But why do you like her?
Well, Jax likes her, and I like Jax.
translation.ja: ジャックスに好かれてる

translation.en: [Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.ja: 多弁なほうではないから 手短かにする

translation.en: "There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.ja: 冷凍庫にジャックス用の肉と あなたへ現金がある

translation.en: "There are certain decisions I made that you will never understand."
translation.ja: 私の決断を あなたは理解できないはず

translation.en: "But that's all in the past now."
translation.ja: でも もう昔のこと

translation.en: "What made me great at some things made me lousy at others."
translation.ja: 特技が裏目に出ることもある

translation.en: "I wish I could say that some good came from what I did."
translation.ja: 良い影響を残せていたら よかった

translation.en: I left the world a more dangerous place."
translation.ja: 世界を より危険にした

translation.en: -Mr. Hippo! -I'm exhausted. Come on, Mr. Hippo.
translation.ja: カバさん やめて カバよ　おやすみ
カバよ　おやすみ 暑い

translation.en: Yeah, now I'm hot too. But you'll be cold soon because it's raining.
translation.ja: でも雨だから すぐ寒くなる

translation.en: Oh, it's just the wind, baby. Don't be scared.
translation.ja: 風よ　怖がらないで

translation.en: -Are you scared? -Do you wanna sleep with me tonight?
-Oh, if you need me to, I will. -I think I do.
translation.ja: 寝ようか？ そうして

translation.en: -Hey! -[lamp plays tune] Do not test my patience, little lady. [laughing]
translation.ja: 怒らないと思ってるのね

translation.en: I'm just gonna go flip the breaker.
Where's your goddamn phone? I gotta call the sheriff.
translation.ja: 電話は？ 保安官に電話する

translation.en: -[gasps] God damn it! Fuck! -[Lou] Slow down. What happened?
translation.ja: クソッ 何があったの？

translation.en: -[gasps] Vee's gone. -What, you let her wander off again?
translation.ja: 娘がいない また遊ばせてるの？

translation.en: -She's not gonna get far in this. -No, no, no.
translation.ja: また遊ばせてるの？ 父親が連れ去った
父親が連れ去った 父親？

translation.en: He's… he's here. How the hell is he here?
He… he's supposed to be dead, but he found us.
translation.ja: 死んだはずなのに現れた

translation.en: I-- I thought we were free of him.
translation.ja: 彼がクリスを殺した 彼がクリスを殺した 〝ママ 俺の番だ〞
彼がクリスを殺した 〝ママ 俺の番だ〞 まさか

translation.en: Where are your keys? The car won't start. I gotta get to the sheriff.
translation.ja: 車の鍵は？ 保安官の所へ行く

translation.en: -[engine coughing] -No, no, no, no, no! Come on!
Ho-- how did you know it was gonna blow up?
-[whining] -Sorry about that, buddy. Turns out I'm not done yet.
translation.ja: おいで　まだ終われない

translation.en: A bomb? It means he's been plannin' this, Lou.
translation.ja: 爆弾だなんて計画的ね

translation.en: We gotta get more help. We need to get to the sheriff.
Can't get to him. No cars. Phones are down. We're ten miles outside of town.
translation.ja: 車はなく電話もつながらない 街は離れてる

translation.en: Your kid's gettin' further away by the second.
translation.ja: 今もヴィーは離れてく 追うのよ
今もヴィーは離れてく 追うのよ 何？

translation.en: You don't understand. Philip was a Green Beret.
translation.ja: フィリップは特殊部隊にいて

translation.en: Wanted for some terrible shit that he did in Central America.
translation.ja: 中米の事件で 指名手配されてた

translation.en: I saw the court transcripts. He was torturing hostages for fun.
translation.ja: 裁判記録によると 人質を拷問してた

translation.en: He's highly trained. An explosives expert. Well, we're no match for him, Lou.
translation.ja: プロだから 私たちじゃ立ち向かえない

translation.en: We need professional help. You and the dog ain't gonna cut it.
translation.ja: あなたとイヌじゃなく プロが必要

translation.en: Did he take anything from your trailer?
[mother] Her-- her favorite stuffy, Mr. Hippo.
translation.ja: 娘の好きなカバと毛布を

translation.en: -And a-- a blanket. -He wants her comfortable.
translation.ja: 娘の好きなカバと毛布を 安心させるため

translation.en: When they tried to arrest him, he blew his apartment up.
translation.ja: 彼は逮捕される際 爆死して

translation.en: They sent a death certificate. How the hell could he still be alive?
translation.ja: 死亡診断書もあるのに
ハロタン　睡眠ガス

translation.en: You're lucky it didn't knock you out.
If he gets her off the island, this will get a lot messier. Airport and ferry are closed.
translation.ja: 島から出るなら 空港もフェリーもダメ

translation.en: Private vessel. He's headed to the coast.
He's got a head start. I gotta move fast.
translation.ja: 急いで追いかける ここにいて

translation.en: Stay here. The storm clears, head into town.
translation.ja: 急いで追いかける ここにいて 晴れたら街へ出て 保安官に連絡を

translation.en: First house you see, call the sheriff.
translation.ja: 晴れたら街へ出て 保安官に連絡を

translation.en: -Hey, where are you goin'? -To find my child.
You don't know what you're doing.
If you slow me down, I will leave you behind.
translation.ja: 足手まといなら置いてく

translation.en: We're close. We're clearing the ridge. We'll be there shortly.
translation.ja: だが 近づいてるから すぐ着く

translation.en: No. No, no, no. It's okay.
I know it's been a while.
Yes, it is. It's-- it's me.
You came back from your adventure.
And… and I even brought you a present.
Is it part of the treasure?
And… you and I are gonna go on our own adventure together.
translation.ja: 今から君と一緒に 冒険に行くんだ

translation.en: Where's Mo-- Where's Mommy? Is she coming with us?
translation.ja: ママも一緒に来るでしょ？

translation.en: Yeah, of course she is. Of course she is.
I left her a note and some clues to follow us,
translation.ja: メモと手がかりを残したから

translation.en: and she's gonna meet up with us after, okay?
-Do you copy? -All right, I've gotta do one more thing.
And then you and I are gonna start our adventure together.
See, you put these on… All right, like that.
translation.ja: これを付けて　それでいい

translation.en: -[Lou] You know them? -Tony and Gerry. They served with Philip.
translation.ja: 知り合い？ フィリップの軍人仲間

translation.en: They're just as vicious as he is. Come on.
translation.ja: 悪い奴らよ 行こう

translation.en: Stay down. Your jacket might as well have a target painted on it.
translation.ja: 伏せて　上着が目立ちすぎる

translation.en: Suppose this is just a distraction? Buying him more time to get away with Vee.
translation.ja: 私たちの気をそらし 逃げる時間を 稼いでるだけかも

translation.en: It's the kind of game he likes to play.
translation.ja: 逃げる時間を 稼いでるだけかも

translation.en: Danglin' somethin' shiny in front of you, and you don't notice when he's about to bash you over your goddamn head.
translation.ja: 目の前の物に気を取られると 頭を殴られる

translation.en: [grunts] Do you know how to use this?

translation.ja: ええ　彼と別れてから学んだ

translation.en: -I took lessons after I left him. -All right, I'm gonna go have a look.
translation.ja: ええ　彼と別れてから学んだ 様子を見てくる

translation.en: If anybody gets too close, use this.
translation.ja: 敵が近い時は これで目を狙う 見えなければ殺せない

translation.en: Go for the eyes. A man can't kill what he can't see.
translation.ja: これで目を狙う 見えなければ殺せない

translation.en: -How do you know all this? -Girl Scouts.
translation.ja: 何の知識？ ガールスカウト

translation.en: [man 1] All right, no one's gonna follow him in this shit.
I'm telling you, this feels like another one of Philip's fucked-up games.
translation.ja: またフィリップのゲームか

translation.en: Oh, excuse me. I'm completely turned around out here. I--
translation.ja: すみません 道に迷ったようで

translation.en: I… I was looking for my dog. The poor little guy--
translation.ja: イヌを捜してるんです

translation.en: Okay. Do… do you have a phone I could use?
translation.ja: そう 電話を借りても？

translation.en: Look, I-- I don't think I can make it the three hours back home, but…
translation.ja: 家まで帰るのに ３時間じゃすまない

translation.en: if I could just rest and get my… my bearings?
translation.ja: 少し休んで落ち着きたくて

translation.en: She lost her dog, man. She's soaked.
Just need to get my blood movin' again.
My goodness. Quite a storm out there.
Oh, sorry, I'm-- I'm Martha. Flemming.
translation.ja: マーサ･フレミングです

translation.en: But you might know my husband, Gordon.

translation.ja: 夫を知ってるかも… いや

translation.en: Here. Why don't you grab a seat?
-Give those cold feet a break. -They sure could use it.
translation.ja: 冷えた足を休ませろ ぜひ
ええ　32年です どこがいい？ 交通も天気もダメ

translation.en: It's a pain in the ass to get to. -Weather's shit. [chuckles] -[sighs]
translation.ja: どこがいい？ 交通も天気もダメ

translation.en: Come on, Tony, relax. She's just an old lady.
[breathing shakily] The soup smells so good.
So nice and warm in here.
I swear. That's all I know.
[sighs] Jax. What'd I tell you about that?
Gerry, he say anything about Vee before you killed him?
translation.ja: 殺す前に奴は何か言ってた？

translation.en: Here. Take this outside. Go through it.
translation.ja: これを外に　急いで

translation.en: -We might be able to reach the sheriff. -Not in this weather.
translation.ja: 保安官に連絡を フィリップが警戒する

translation.en: More likely it'll tip off Philip.
translation.ja: フィリップが警戒する

translation.en: -What channel would the emergency-- -Don't argue with me. Leave it.
translation.ja: 何番？ やめて　ほっといて

translation.en: You know, I was in the Girl Scouts, too.
Got my archery badge, pen pal, first aid.
translation.ja: アーチェリーや 応急処置は学んだ

translation.en: There wasn't one for hand-to-hand combat or murder with household objects.
translation.ja: でも接近戦や 殺人は学んでない

translation.en: Really? Must've just been my troop, then.
What branch of the military were you in?
translation.ja: 軍では どこの所属？

translation.en: -Wouldn't have guessed that. -Be a shit spy if you did.
translation.ja: 意外ね バレてたら失格

translation.en: -[Philip] Can-- can you hold it? -[Vee] Nuh-uh.
-♪ That guide me towards salvation… ♪ -[Philip] Okay. Short break.
Yeah. No, he's got-- he's got a bad wing, Vee.
translation.ja: 羽をケガしてるんだよ

translation.en: there's nothing you can do to save them.
It's almost like they were meant to die.
Uh… Here. We'll put him right up here.
-All right. Come on. -Wait, I haven't peed yet.
translation.ja: 行こう まだしてない

translation.en: Come on. We gotta keep movin'.
Hi. We have to walk now, okay?
translation.ja: やあ　歩くことになった

translation.en: I need a break to warm up.
He takes breaks too. I can tell by the tracks. Come on.
translation.ja: 彼も休憩してる 痕跡で分かる

translation.en: [Lou] You walked a long way on that. You should've said somethin'.
translation.ja: その状態で歩いてたの？

translation.en: And give you an excuse to abandon me?

translation.ja: ありがとう　貴重な助言ね

translation.en: Just saying you could've left him sooner.
translation.ja: 早く別れるべきだった

translation.en: What is it you know about being with someone like him?
So maybe don't tell me what I should have done.
I didn't recognize who I was with him.
translation.ja: 私が どうかしてた

translation.en: I actually felt I could fix him.
You know, when we met, he was loving, he was caring…
translation.ja: 出会った頃は愛に満ちていて 優しかったけど傷ついてた
優しかったけど傷ついてた

translation.en: For so long, I thought… thought it was all me.
translation.ja: 長い間 私のせいだと 思ってた

translation.en: [sighs] "Why am I failing him? Why isn't my love enough?"
translation.ja: 愛が足りないから 彼を失望させてると

translation.en: That son of a bitch is a monster.
Whatever the hell made him this way.
There ain't no amount of love in this entire world
translation.ja: どんなに愛を与え続けても

translation.en: that's gonna be able to save that man.
When he would get into his moods,
translation.ja: 彼の機嫌が悪くなると
娘に“ゲームはじめ”と言う

translation.en: Actually made it into a… a goddamn game.
translation.ja: そうやってゲームにした

translation.en: [sniffling] He always said, if I took Vee away, he'd kill us both.
translation.ja: 娘と逃げたら ２人とも殺すと言ってた

translation.en: Go on… Tell me what I should've done.
translation.ja: どうすべきだったか 教えてよ

translation.en: I guess we've all been through things other people will never understand.
translation.ja: 他人には理解されないものよ

translation.en: [Hannah murmurs] Oh, shit, shit, shit, shit.
How the hell did he do this with Vee?

translation.ja: どうしよう　起きて
どうしよう　起きて ルー

translation.en: I can help you if you just let me.
[grunts] Get up. We just lost an hour on him.
Hey, I told you to leave that behind.
Storm's passed. I'm gonna climb up to that hilltop.
translation.ja: 嵐は過ぎた 丘の上なら つながるかも
嵐は過ぎた 丘の上なら つながるかも 時間がない

translation.en: God damn it. Can you stop bein' so stubborn? We need help.
translation.ja: 頑固なのね　助けが必要よ

translation.en: -There is no one who can help us. -[sighs] Shit.
translation.ja: 誰も助けてくれない 動き続けて

translation.en: -I'm all you've got. Now keep movin'. -[sighs] Why are you helpin' me, Lou?
translation.ja: 誰も助けてくれない 動き続けて なぜ協力を？

translation.en: No one's comin' or goin' in water this rough.
translation.ja: この海じゃ出られない
じゃあ どこ？ こっちよ

translation.en: We can do this all day.
[Lou] Maybe you're right. Maybe we do need help.
translation.ja: 確かに助けが必要かも

translation.en: See if you can raise Rankin. Emergency services are channel 16.
translation.ja: ランキンを呼んで 緊急通報は16番

translation.en: Meet me back here when you're done.
Try not to blow your brains out.
that there are handprints like these in caves all over the world?
translation.ja: 世界中の洞くつに こんな手形があるんだ

translation.en: And long after you and Mommy and I are all dead…
translation.ja: 君やママやパパが死んでも

translation.en: these handprints are still gonna be here.
translation.ja: この手形は ずっと残る

translation.en: [Hannah, breaking up] Hello? Can anyone hear me? Hello?

translation.ja: 誰か聞こえない？ ランキン保安官だ

translation.en: Oh God. Thank God. This is-- this is Hannah Dawson.
Uh-- Okay. [gasps] My daughter was kidnapped by her father.
translation.ja: 娘が父親に誘拐された

translation.en: [breaking up] Hannah Dawson? Can you hear me?
-[Torres] Go, Sheriff. -Listen, we got a situation.
translation.ja: 保安官 問題発生だ

translation.en: This is gonna sound a bit crazy, but I think Hannah Dawson's daughter has been kidnapped by… by her father.
translation.ja: おかしな話だがハンナの娘が 父親に誘拐されたとか

translation.en: Listen, let's put it on the wire, right away,
translation.ja: すぐに緊急手配してほしい

translation.en: in case she's taken off the island.
Okay? Hannah and Vee Dawson and Lou Adell. I think she mentioned Lou.
translation.ja: ハンナとヴィーだ ルーの名前も出ていた

translation.en: I've made sure she'll sleep through this.
Just tell me one thing. And be honest here.
I knew you'd track down Hannah and Vee sooner or later.
translation.ja: ハンナたちは いずれ見つかる

translation.en: I wasn't gonna be able to protect them forever.
Protect them? [scoffs] All of this is happening because of you.
translation.ja: 守る？　あんたのせいだろ

translation.en: Okay? And Hannah may be too naive to-- to see it, but I don't.
translation.ja: ハンナは だませるだろうが

translation.en: Hannah doesn't know who I am.
You still can't even admit I'm your son.
So what's the plan, Philip? Why the elaborate chase?
translation.ja: なぜ私たちに追わせるの？

translation.en: Why let us track you? You don't wanna hurt your kid.
Did you know that Vee is the same age as I was when those-- those men took me?
translation.ja: 俺が奴らに連れ去られた時 ヴィーの年頃だった

translation.en: Yeah, but they weren't as nice as, uh…
translation.ja: 奴らは優しくなかった

translation.en: Can you appreciate that? The symmetry of that?
translation.ja: 分かるか？　この類似性が

translation.en: I thought my mommy was comin' back to save me, too.
It was a trap. If I'd tried to save you, they would have had us both.
translation.ja: 助けに行ってたら 共倒れしてた

translation.en: Bullshit. You wanted to maintain your cover.
I was a pawn for your mission. Nothin' else.
translation.ja: 俺は任務に利用された

translation.en: -I had you rescued. I got you out of Iran. -Then why didn't you come back with me?
translation.ja: イランから脱出させた なぜ一緒に帰らなかった？
なぜ一緒に帰らなかった？

translation.en: Because you chose the fucking CIA over your own child.
translation.ja: 息子よりＣＩＡを選んだんだ

translation.en: Yeah, how'd that work out for you? Hmm?
I mean, did you guys fuck up anything worse than you fucked up Iran?
And then you steal my wife and-- and my kid--
translation.ja: その上 妻と娘を奪った

translation.en: Hannah and Vee had nothing to do with my mistakes. Leave them out of this.
translation.ja: 私の過ちとは別の話よ

translation.en: Oh, spare me the fuckin' morality lesson.
You gave up that right a long time ago.
You move, I'mma put a bullet in you.
Leave Vee with me and go.
translation.ja: ヴィーを残して消えて

translation.en: I'll throw them off your trail.

translation.ja: フィリップ 聞いて

translation.en: I didn't protect you when you were a kid. So let me do it now.
translation.ja: 前は守れなかったから 今 守る

translation.en: Before I knew you took Vee last night, I had my rifle pressed against my head. I'm not afraid to go.
translation.ja: 昨夜 死ぬつもりだった 死は恐れてない

translation.en: [mumbles] You just can't stop messin' with my head, can't you?
Kid, I wouldn't even know where to start.
The minute I heard you blew yourself up, I knew it was time.
translation.ja: あなたが自爆したと聞き

translation.en: I thought Hannah and Vee were safe. My mission was complete. But you tricked me there, didn't you?
translation.ja: ハンナとヴィーは 安全だと思ったのに違った

translation.en: You always were smarter than me.
Beat my ass at chess when you were five years old.
For once, we're playin' my game.
translation.ja: 今回こそは俺のゲームだ

translation.en: It's time to end this legacy.
Put this whole family out of its misery.
translation.ja: 一族を苦しみから救う
あなたは彼女の父親よ

translation.en: We'll be waiting for you at the lighthouse.
[man on radio] Just checking in on ya. How are you doing out there?
translation.ja: 安否を確認しています

translation.en: -Talk to me, Deputy. -Still no hits on the APBs.
I notified ATF about the bomb in the truck and the coroner about the body.
translation.ja: 爆弾と遺体の件は報告済み

translation.en: They're sending teams when the weather lets up.
translation.ja: 嵐の後チームが来ます

translation.en: -This is Rankin. Who's this? -Sheriff, Dominick Crown here.
translation.ja: ランキンだ ドミニク･クラウンだ ファックスは？

translation.en: Did you receive our facsimile transmission?
translation.ja: ドミニク･クラウンだ ファックスは？

translation.en: Yeah, I got it right here.
We've seen the APB for the woman you know as Lou Adell.
translation.ja: ルー･アデルという女性は

translation.en: Is she a match for the person in that photo?
[Rankin] Yeah. Yeah, it sure looks like her.

translation.ja: 確かですか？ 彼女だ

translation.en: No. Are you telling me that this guy is involved?
translation.ja: いや　この男が何か？

translation.en: Do you have any intel on the location of these individuals?
translation.ja: 彼らの現在地は？ 一緒にいる？

translation.en: -Are they together? -Well, I don't know if they're together.
translation.ja: 彼らの現在地は？ 一緒にいる？ 分からない

translation.en: What I believe is that they're headed to Eagle Bay, on the west side of our island.
translation.ja: だがイーグル･ベイへ 向かうはず

translation.en: We need to make sure no civilians go anywhere near that location. Set up roadblocks and cordon the area.
translation.ja: 民間人を近づかせず 道路を封鎖してくれ

translation.en: There's a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.ja: 誘拐された娘を 母親が捜してる

translation.en: Asshole put me on hold. Unbelievable.
translation.ja: 保留だ　信じられない

translation.en: The male fugitive is US Army Special Forces,
translation.ja: この男は米陸軍特殊部隊で

translation.en: convicted in the murder of numerous civilians.
translation.ja: 多くの民間人殺害で有罪だ

translation.en: The female is a high-priority target for the CIA.
This investigation is now under the jurisdiction of the US Marshals.
translation.ja: 連邦保安局が捜査を引継ぐ 攻撃許可が出ている

translation.en: Do not allow any approach to Eagle Bay.
translation.ja: イーグル･ベイへは近づくな

translation.en: -Not by your department, not-- -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.ja: イーグル･ベイへは近づくな だが誘拐された少女と 母親がいる

translation.en: There-- there is a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.ja: だが誘拐された少女と 母親がいる

translation.en: Stay out of our way, Sheriff.
[Hannah] Lou, sorry it took me so long.
I tried to get as high as I could, but…
translation.ja: 高い場所を目指したけど…

translation.en: Oh God, oh God, oh God. Okay, wait, wait. Let me help. Let me help.
translation.ja: どういうこと？　見せて

translation.en: And Vee? Is she… is she all right?
She's okay for now. He's taking her to the lighthouse.
translation.ja: 今は大丈夫 彼が灯台へ連れてった

translation.en: -Pack the wound. -I'm coming. I'm coming. I'm coming.
translation.ja: クソッ　ガーゼを 今すぐやる

translation.en: Fill it with gauze. As-- as much as you can.

translation.ja: 大変 もっと深く　詰めて
もっと深く　詰めて ルー 巻き込んで ごめんなさい

translation.en: -[groans] -Jesus, Lou. -I'm so sorry I dragged you into this. -[moans]
translation.ja: ルー 巻き込んで ごめんなさい

translation.en: Put your hand here. Right. Press down. Okay, good. I gotta-- I gotta grab some tape.
translation.ja: 手で ここを押さえて テープを

translation.en: Hannah. Did you reach the sheriff?
I found those at the cabin. I meant to tell you.
translation.ja: 小屋で見つけて話そうと…

translation.en: This message isn't for me, is it?
I need you to say it.
When I was stationed in Iran, I had to get close to a very dangerous man.
translation.ja: イラン駐在時 非常に危険な人物に 近づく必要があった
非常に危険な人物に 近づく必要があった

translation.en: I kept the baby to keep my cover.
translation.ja: それに息子を利用した

translation.en: You mean… you mean Philip? The baby? You mean your son?
translation.ja: フィリップが あなたの息子？

translation.en: So what is this? Some game?
You fucking with me? What, you tell him where we were, or…
translation.ja: 私たちの居場所を伝えた？

translation.en: -What-- what is this? -No. I wasn't helping him.
translation.ja: 逆よ あなたたちを守るため…

translation.en: -I was helping you. You and Vee. -Stop lying to me.
translation.ja: 逆よ あなたたちを守るため… ウソはやめて

translation.en: I got you to this island.
translation.ja: 私が あなたを この島に招いた

translation.en: The one who told you about the beautiful secluded place on Orcas Island
translation.ja: この島を勧めた 隠れ家的で 安い家賃の家があると
隠れ家的で 安い家賃の家があると

translation.en: I had her run into you on the street. [sighs]
I blackmailed the CIA to force an investigation into what he did in El Salvador.
translation.ja: ＣＩＡを脅し 彼がしたことを調査させた

translation.en: -You think you saved us? -I knew he'd track you eventually.
translation.ja: 守る？ 彼が探したら…

translation.en: You didn't save us. I got Vee away from him.
translation.ja: 守ってない 娘を彼から離し

translation.en: I took care of her every goddamn day and made sure she was safe.
translation.ja: 私が毎日 大切に守った

translation.en: Now she's out there with him because of you.
translation.ja: でも あなたのせいで台なし

translation.en: You're no damn hero. You're a fucking coward.
-Wow. -All that rage that that man felt.
All the rage inside of that man that he felt,
that he aimed towards me, is because of you.
translation.ja: あなたが原因の怒りよ

translation.en: Not everybody is meant to be a mother.
translation.ja: 母親に向かない人もいる

translation.en: But you could have been a little more human.
translation.ja: でも人間らしく振る舞えた

translation.en: You drove past our trailer every day.
translation.ja: 毎日 通り過ぎてた

translation.en: You drove past your own granddaughter, Lou.
You didn't talk to her. You didn't speak to her.
translation.ja: ヴィーに 話しかけることもなく

translation.en: What kind of person could do that to their own family?
translation.ja: 自分の家族なのに なぜ？

translation.en: [grunts] Come on. We gotta keep moving.
translation.ja: 行こう　急がないと

translation.en: Hannah, you don't know where they're going.
You said the lighthouse. I'll follow the coastline.
translation.ja: 灯台でしょ　海岸を探す

translation.en: Not on your own. It's a trap.
translation.ja: 行かないで　ワナよ

translation.en: -Please. There's one thing I'm good for. -Not anymore.
translation.ja: 私の得意分野だから もう違う

translation.en: Never thought I'd be excited to see you.
translation.ja: 会えて嬉(うれ)しいとはね
初めてだな　ハンナは？

translation.en: -Where's Hannah? -On her way to the lighthouse.
translation.ja: 初めてだな　ハンナは？ 灯台へ向かった
灯台へ向かった 娘さんは？

translation.en: That's exactly what the feds said about you.
You stay here. I'll send someone for you as soon as the road's clear.
translation.ja: ここにいて　誰か来させる

translation.en: Wait. For fuck's sake, help me outside. I'm suffocating in here.
translation.ja: 待って　外に出して 息が詰まる

translation.en: You gonna tell me why the CIA's lookin' for you, Lou?
[Lou] I used some evidence I held onto.
Documents. Proving CIA involvement in the coup in Iran.
translation.ja: イランのクーデター関与を 証明する書類

translation.en: Ah. I can see why they'd be pissed about that.
[Lou] Fuck, they won't care about collateral damage. You gotta get Hannah and Vee out of there.
translation.ja: その前にハンナと ヴィーを連れ出そう

translation.en: [groans] This thing starts up again, I'm gonna bleed out.
Will you get the first-aid kit? I left it in there.

translation.ja: ヴィー ママ こっち
ここよ 今 行く

translation.en: We were afraid you weren't gonna show up. Weren't we, Vee?
Of course she's okay. She's with her daddy.
translation.ja: 当然だ　パパと一緒だから

translation.en: Hey, how's-- how's Lou doin'? Is she-- Is she on her way?
translation.ja: ルーは？　来ないのか？

translation.en: Still waitin' for my mommy to come back after all these years, huh?
translation.ja: 今も母親を待ってるとはね

translation.en: But we do need her here to finish this.
I wanna give Mommy a hug.
One quick hug while we wait for Lou.
[laughing] Oh, I missed you so much.
Daddy, may I go to the bathroom?
But hey… Come right back, okay?
Wow, Lou is really rubbin' off on you.
Come on, just give me the gun. We both know you're not gonna shoot me.
translation.ja: 銃を渡せ　撃たないだろ

translation.en: You don't know me, Phil. You never did.
translation.ja: 私のこと何も知らないくせに

translation.en: I know that if you were gonna shoot me, you would have done it years ago.
translation.ja: 撃てるなら とっくに撃ってた

translation.en: I know that you're not like Lou and me.
Yeah, 'cause she would've shot me already.
Come on. Give me the gun.
You abandon me, and then you steal my baby from me,
translation.ja: 俺を見捨て 娘を奪って さらに撃つのか？

translation.en: That shit won't work on me. Not gonna work on me anymore, Phil.
translation.ja: やめて　その手には乗らない

translation.en: [shudders] I'm not afraid of you anymore.
And I won't let you hurt my little girl the way you hurt me.
translation.ja: 私のように 娘は傷つけさせない

translation.en: Game's over, okay? Come here, Little Rabbit.
translation.ja: おいで　リトル･ラビット

translation.en: Oh! Oh, baby. Come on. Get up. Are you okay?
translation.ja: ヴィー 大丈夫だった？

translation.en: Did he hurt you? He didn't hurt you, right?

translation.ja: ナイフ 手に刺した

translation.en: Try that hatch. Go, go, now.

translation.ja: 引っかかった クソッ

translation.en: Run to the end of the beach. -Run as fast as you can. -No!
translation.ja: 急いで浜辺まで走って

translation.en: We won't fit. You gotta run now. Go, go, go, go.
translation.ja: すぐ追いかける 走って　リトル･ラビット
走って　リトル･ラビット

translation.en: [Lou] It's rigged. I can't defuse it.
Could buy us some time if I can change the frequency.
translation.ja: 周波数を変えて時間を稼ぐ

translation.en: One of us was actually a Girl Scout.
Maybe we can use it after all. Go bust that gate open.
translation.ja: 使えるかも　ドアを破って

translation.en: I was hoping that we could all do this together.
translation.ja: 全員で やり遂げたかった

translation.en: So that we could end this… the right way.
But sometimes, you don't get what you want.
[screams] Fuck! You fuckin' let me in!
[panting] They comin' for Philip or you?
They won't want either one of us to leave here alive.

translation.ja: 行って　待たないで

translation.en: -I'll just slow you down. -I'm not gonna leave you here.
translation.ja: 行って　待たないで 置いてかない

translation.en: Lou, go get your granddaughter to safety. I'll catch up.
You're a brave little girl. You know that?
Good. Help me up, will you?
Okay, listen to me. I want you to go grab a stick, okay?
translation.ja: 聞いて 棒を持ってきて

translation.en: The longest one you can find. Go, go, go.
Hannah, hold this up as high as you can.
-[Hannah] Are you calling for help? -[Lou] Yeah.
[Lou] Yeah. That ought to get their attention.
You gotta go. Take the road back towards town.
translation.ja: 行って 街に戻って　ジャックスと

translation.en: -Bring Jax with you. -You… you come with us.
translation.ja: 街に戻って　ジャックスと 一緒に来て

translation.en: Hannah, you take care of your kid…
I left a letter for you at my house. Make sure you find it.
translation.ja: 家に手紙を残した　見つけて

translation.en: Don't die on me now, Lou.
Everything that matters is right here in front of you.
translation.ja: 大事な物は今ここにある

translation.en: Hey, you got two bracelets now.
[man] So, out of the blue, she just leaves you and your daughter this house?
translation.ja: 突然 あなた方に 家を残した？

translation.en: Mm-hm. Yeah, this house and a ton of frozen deer meat.
translation.ja: はい　この家と冷凍の鹿肉を

translation.en: We had a few more questions for Ms. Dawson here.
Oh. I hope I'm not interrupting.
[clears throat] Hannah, uh, coroner's got an issue.
translation.ja: ハンナ 検視官からだ

translation.en: You're next of kin. He needs a signature to release Philip's body for burial.
translation.ja: 最近親者として フィリップの埋葬の署名を

translation.en: Ms. Dawson, did Lou Adell ever mention anything about documents from her time in the CIA to you?
translation.ja: ルー･アデルから ＣＩＡ時代の書類の話を？

translation.en: She'd be a pretty shit spy if she did.
translation.ja: してたらスパイ失格ね

translation.en: [chuckles] You gave me a card last time you were here, and the time before that.
translation.ja: 前回も名刺をもらってる

translation.en: Looks like you two are ready for Seattle. Yeah, you're all packed up.
translation.ja: シアトル行きの荷造りは 終えたんだな

translation.en: I wanted to tell you, you just did a beautiful job with the memorial service.
translation.ja: 追悼式では すばらしかった

translation.en: -Stop. -No, you did. And I think Lou would have really appreciated it.
[scoffs] Come on now. All that sincere emotion would have made her puke.
translation.ja: 真摯な思いに うんざりしてそう

translation.en: I mean, sometimes, I'm just so damn mad at her, and then…
translation.ja: 彼女に怒りを 感じる時もあるし

translation.en: Isn't that just how it is with family?
[Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.ja: 多弁なほうではないから 手短かにする

translation.en: "There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.ja: 冷凍庫にジャックス用の肉と あなたへ現金がある

translation.en: "Life doesn't give you second chances, but sometimes it does offer a fresh start."
translation.ja: 再挑戦は難しくても 再出発はできる

translation.en: "Hannah, you're going to wonder why I did it." "Why I left this all for you."
translation.ja: なぜ あなたにすべてを 残したか教える

translation.en: you'll leave the world a better place than I did."
translation.ja: 良い世界を残せるから
